name: Customer.io
description: Supercharge your email engagement in Customer.io

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Send users to Customer.io when belonging to one of these segments

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments_hero
private_settings.headerTemplate:
The above list of segments is a whitelist. You need to *explicitely specify one or more segments* for which events and users shall be sent to Customer.io.
If you do not specify any segment, no user or event will be sent to Customer.io.
private_settings.title: Whitelisted Segments

private_settings.name: enable_user_deletion
private_settings.title: Enable User Deletion
private_settings.description: If this field is enabled, users who don't match the Segments above will be DELETED from Customer.io. Otherwise they will be ignored

private_settings.name: send_events_hero
private_settings.headerTemplate:
The above list of events is a whitelist. You need to *explicitely specify one or more events* that shall be sent to Customer.io.
If you do not specify any event, no event data will be sent to Customer.io.
private_settings.title: Whitelisted Events

private_settings.name: user_id_mapping
private_settings.title: Which user attribute to send as the customerId

private_settings.name: synchronized_attributes
private_settings.title: Send Attributes to Customer.io
private_settings.description: Email, customerId and hull_segments are sent automatically
